column4: How can I change stuff in /var/www. I never have enough rights! chmod 777 doesnt work!
apex I want to unpack the CMS Websitebaker to /var/www/
try tar xf filename, or xzf if zipped or xBf for bzipped xzvf list's the files extracted as well
tar was originally made to run in a pipe so you would write cat | tar -x or for zipped files zcat | tar -x
